mapper.select: SELECT o.`id`, o.`user_id` AS userId, o.`name`, o.`phone`, o.`address`, o.`address_id` AS addressId, o.`product_id` AS productId, o.`number`, o.`price`, o.`total`, o.`status`, o.`create_time` AS createTime, o.`update_time` AS updateTime, p.`name` AS productName, p.`image` AS productImage, p.`description` AS description, p.`is_down` AS isDown, p.`category_id` AS categoryId FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN `product` p ON o.`product_id` = p.`id` WHERE o.`user_id` = #{userId} ORDER BY o.`id` DESC
